data.name: Magic Word Alchemist Sound Track
data.detailed_description:
Magic Word Alchemist Sound Track


A collection of high quality, new full length music tracks not included with the original game. All tracks come in mp3 format.

TRACK LIST:
Magic Word Alchemist Track 1 - Length 5:02
Magic Word Alchemist Track 2 - Length 2:50
Magic Word Alchemisr Track 3 - Length 3:47
Magic Word Alchemist Track 4 - Length 2:37
Magic Word Alchemist Track 5 - Length 3:52

FEATURES:
5 New High Quality Full Length Tracks
MP3 Format

After installing this DLC, a folder titled DLC Sound Track will appear in your Magic Word Alchemist app folder. This will contain the 5 High Quality Music Tracks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
